availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Adam Walter (Louisville, Kentucky, wagon maker and teamster)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, wagon maker and teamster. Native of Baden. Married to Eve Fagar Walter in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 12, 1850. Father of George Walter, Lizzie Walter, Mary Walter, Martha Walter, and John Walter. Wagon maker in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Wagon maker in Louisville in 1858. Wagon maker in Louisville in 1860. Wagon maker in Louisville in 1861. Teamster in Louisville in 1863.
